title: Cycle #41
content:
1.29705810 BTC in stacking rewards were wrapped to 1.29373355 xBTC. These were converted to 73,038.660774 STX on alexgo. That is a rate of 1771 sats/stx.

72,192.744519 STX to 1594 members and 0.01520004 xBTC (858.274655 STX) to 30 members were distributed.

That is a theoretical total of 73,051.019198 STX (0.41% of total stacked STX).
